exceptions.tactic: intros x y ll Hxy Hsorted.
intros x' y ll Hxy Hsorted.
intros x' y' ll Hxy Hsorted.

ctx: intros x' y' ll' Hxy Hsorted.
exceptions.tactic: intros l a m b r Hll.

ctx: intros x' y' ll' Hxy Hsorted.
intros x' y' ll' Hxy Hsorted.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hll was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros x' y' ll' Hxy Hsorted.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : nat ll : list nat x' : x < y y' : forall (l : list nat) (a : nat) (m : list nat) (b : nat) (r : list nat), y :: ll = l ++ a :: m ++ b :: r -> a < b ll' : list nat Hxy : nat Hsorted : list nat b : nat r : list nat H : x :: y :: ll = ll' ++ Hxy :: Hsorted ++ b :: r H1 : forall (a n : nat) (l : list nat) (x : nat) (m : list nat) (y : nat) (r : list nat), list_an a n = l ++ x :: m ++ y :: r -> y < a + n H2 : forall (a n : nat) (l : list nat) (x : nat) (m : list nat) (y : nat) (r : list nat), list_an a n = l ++ x :: m ++ y :: r -> x < y H0 : forall (a n : nat) (l : list nat) (x : nat) (m : list nat) (y : nat) (r : list nat), list_an a n = l ++ x :: m ++ y :: r -> a <= x Unable to unify "?M2271 <= S ?M2272" with "S Hxy <= b".

original: intros x y ll Hxy Hsorted. unfold nat_sorted in *. intros l a m b r Hll. apply list_an_duplicate_inv in Hll. destruct Hll as [H1 H2]. constructor. - lia. - apply Hsorted with (l:=l)(m:=m)(r:=r). apply H1.
